title: OTC Drugs Market to Reach USD 233.6 Billion with 5.8% CAGR in 2028; Rising Geriatric Population and Cost-effectiveness of These Products to Augment Growth, says Fortune Business Insights™
The vascular segment held the largest share of the market in 2020, and it is further expected to register the highest CAGR in the market during 2021–2028
